p: Tissues of brain, spleen, and lung of frugivorous bats that were previously positive by RT-PCR and sequenced by the Sanger method were tested with specific antibodies for the VEEV. In Figure-3: (a and b), positive controls (c and d) negative controls, (e, f, and g) positive samples. It is possible to observe VEEV antigens in the brain, spleen, and lung.
